name: The Creatures of Pflaumotopia
description:
In The Creatures of Pflaumotopia, you can create your unique creature from a variety of bodies, bodyparts and colors. Meet creatures
other people created, fight them or mate with them to evolve.
Try to collect as many creatures as you can!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update (06.06.2018):

  • fixed urls so that network communication works again
  • click in the gallery to view the creatures walking animation
